Di Depan Pengusaha, Menteri ESDM Curhat Pemanfaatan EBT Baru 8%
06 Nov 2019, 02:55 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif/Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif membuka acara The 8th Indonesia EBTKE ConEx di Jakarta International Expo (JIExpo) Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Acara yang digelar selama tiga hari, dari tanggal 6 sampai 8 November 2019 dihadiri oleh pengusaha di bidang energi baru terbarukan (EBT) hingga akademisi. Ada sejumlah rangkaian kegiatan di acara ini antara lain seminar hingga pameran.Dalam sambutannya, Arifin bercerita bahwa hari ini tepat dua pekan ia memimpin Kementerian ESDM. Di masa-masa awal, ia banyak belajar mengenai tugas-tugas kementerian.Lanjut Arifin, acara seperti ini penting untuk menentukan arah kebijakan energi nasional ke depan."Kegiatan EBTKE tentu sangat bermanfaat bagi menentukan arah pemanfaatan energi nasional jangka panjang. Kita punya banyak sumber energi yang harus diutilisasi," katanya membuka acara di JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Arifin melanjutkan, saat Perjanjian Paris, dunia fokus pada penanganan emisi dan perubahan iklim lantaran berpengaruh pada kehidupan. Di sisi lain, kata Arifin hal itu merupakan peluang untuk bisnis energi."Inisiasi ini suatu peluang, di lain sisi peluang melakukan inovasi meng-create bisnis baru yang terlibat masalah energi," ujarnya.Arifin mengatakan, potensi EBT mencapai 400 gigawatt (GW). Namun, yang baru terealisasi baru 8%."Sumber-sumber energi terbarukan menurut informasi ada 400 GW dan ini akan saya hitung. Dan baru terealisasi kira-kira 8% kalau tidak salah, tapi 8% kok 32 GW. Jadi masih kecil sekali," terangnya."Kita harus membuat suatu perencanaan bagaimana mengoptimalkan EBT semaksimal mungkin tentu saja akan ada masa-masa transisi. Harus dialog para stakeholder bagaimana memanfaatkan EBT," ujarnya. Simak Video "Blak-blakan Surya Tjandra: Bela Buruh dan Konflik Agraria"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)

In Front of Entrepreneurs, the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources Confers the Utilization of New EBT 8%
06 Nov 2019, 02:55 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif / Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif opened the The 8th Indonesia EBTKE ConEx at the Jakarta International Expo (JIExpo) Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019). The event which was held for three days, from 6 to 8 November 2019 was attended by entrepreneurs in the field of renewable new energy (EBT) to academics. There are a number of series of activities at this event, including seminars to exhibitions. In his remarks, Arifin told me that today was exactly two weeks he was leading the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources. In the early days, he learned a lot about ministry tasks. Arifin continued, events like this are important to determine the direction of national energy policy going forward. "EBTKE activities are certainly very useful for determining the direction of long-term use of national energy. We have many sources energy must be utilized, "he said opening the event at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Arifin continued, during the Paris Agreement, the world focused on managing emissions and climate change because it affected life. On the other hand, said Arifin it was an opportunity for the energy business. "This initiation is an opportunity, on the other hand an opportunity to innovate to create new businesses involved in energy issues," he said. Arifin said, the potential of EBT reached 400 gigawatts (GW) . However, only 8% has been realized. "According to the information, there are 400 GW of renewable energy sources and this will be calculated. And only 8% have been realized if I'm not mistaken, but 8% really are 32 GW. So it's still very small, "he explained." We must make a plan for optimizing EBT as much as possible, of course there will be a transition period. There should be a dialogue of stakeholders how to use EBT, "he said. Check out the video "Surya Tjandra's outspokenness: Defending Labor and Agrarian Conflict" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
